          <title>
            <string language="en">Why aluminium doesn't corrode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Warum Aluminium nicht korrodiert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pourquoi l'aluminium ne corrode pas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porque o alumínio não se corrói</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Perchè l'alluminio non corrode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γιατί το αλουμίνιο δεν διαβρώνει</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Porqué el aluminio no corroe</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the protection of aluminium from corrosion by a tough layer of aluminium oxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aluminium</string>
          </keyword>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Schutz des Aluminiums 
vor Korrosion durch eine haltbare Schicht des Aluminiumoxyds.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la protection de 
l'aluminium contre la corrosion par une couche dure d'oxyde 
d'aluminium.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a proteção do 
alumínio da corrosão por uma camada resistente de óxido de 
alumínio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la protezione di 
alluminio da corrosione da uno strato duro dell'ossido di alluminio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την προστασία του 
αλουμινίου από τη διάβρωση από ένα σκληρό στρώμα του οξειδίου 
αλουμινίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la protección del 
aluminio contra la corrosión por una capa resistente del óxido de 
aluminio.</string>
